question: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) has announced a challenge to develop Video conferencing solution, under which scheme?
explanation:
The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) has announced an ‘Innovation Challenge for Development of a Video Conferencing Solution’ under the Digital India Programme.
The winning team which presents the world-class solution will receive a prize money and assistance of ₹1 crore with additional annual support of ₹10 lakh for three years, for operations and maintenance. Any Indian IT start-up and software product company can participate in the challenge.
